bibl.title: 'Macedonian Times': Hellenistic Memories in the Provinces of the Roman Near East.

bibl.title: Greeks on Greekness. Viewing the Greek Past under the Roman Empire

bibl.seg: SPAWFORTH Tony, 'Macedonian Times': Hellenistic Memories in the Provinces of the Roman Near East.
David KONSTAN and Suzanne SAÏD (Edd.), Greeks on Greekness. Viewing the Greek Past under the Roman Empire = Cambridge Philological Society. Suppl. 29 (Cambridge, 2006) pp. 1-26.

1. Introduction. - 2. The Macedonian identity of the Hellenistic kingdoms in the east. - 3. 'Macedonian times' remembered: Roman Syria and Egypt. - 4. Colonial élites? - 5. Macedonian reflections and the Greek 'renascence'. - 6. 'Macedonian' reflections and Roman power. - 7. Conclusions.
